org.springframework.web.servlet.tags

接口 EditorAwareTag

  • 所有已知实现类:
    AbstractCheckedElementTag, AbstractDataBoundFormElementTag, AbstractHtmlElementBodyTag, AbstractHtmlElementTag, AbstractHtmlInputElementTag, AbstractMultiCheckedElementTag, AbstractSingleCheckedElementTag, BindTag, ButtonTag, CheckboxesTag, CheckboxTag, ErrorsTag, FormTag, HiddenInputTag, InputTag, LabelTag, OptionsTag, OptionTag, PasswordInputTag, RadioButtonsTag, RadioButtonTag, SelectTag, TextareaTag

    public interface EditorAwareTag
    Interface to be implemented by JSP tags that expose a PropertyEditor for a property that they are currently bound to.
    从以下版本开始:
    2.5
    另请参阅:
    BindTag, AbstractDataBoundFormElementTag

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      PropertyEditor getEditor()
      Retrieve the PropertyEditor for the property that this tag is currently bound to.

    • 方法详细资料

      • getEditor

        @Nullable
PropertyEditor getEditor()
                            throws JspException
        Retrieve the PropertyEditor for the property that this tag is currently bound to. Intended for cooperating nesting tags.
        返回:
        the current PropertyEditor, or null if none
        抛出:
        JspException - if resolving the editor failed
